message:
TV Advertisement of Diablo 3


Finaaaaaaaaaaanly, it comes! The Diablo 3 from Blizzard! Just for $529!
What the fuck? $529? It could be the most expensive PC game in the history... But the fact is!

NO! It's NOT!

You could share the fucking serial number with 20 different accounts!
If you do share, you only need to pay $25.45 for a BRAND NEW DIABLO 3!
That's fucking cheap! What you need are just 19 friends who wanna share the price with you!
So what are you waiting for?!
Get out of the fucking house and go make some fucking friends and buy Diablo 3 TOGETHER!


"Friendship is much more awesome than a game."



Blizzard
title: You Need Some F**king Friends!
